name: Result.Extra

values.name: combine
values.comment: Combine a list of results into a single result (holding a list).
values.type: List (Result.Result x a) -> Result.Result x (List a)

values.name: extract
values.comment:
Turn a `Result e a` to an `a`, by applying the conversion
function specified to the `e`.

values.name: isErr
values.comment: Check whether the result is `Err` without unwrapping it.

values.name: isOk
values.comment: Check whether the result is `Ok` without unwrapping it.

values.name: withDefault
values.comment:
Returns a `Result`'s contents if the `Result` is an `Ok`,
or the given default value if the `Result` is an `Err`.
This is basically the same as running `Result.toMaybe` and then `Maybe.withDefault`.

    0 == Result.withDefault 0 (String.toInt "this is not a valid integer!")
